biotools.summary: MaxAlign is a web server for maximizing usable data in an alignment. It maximizes the number of nucleotide (or amino acid) symbols present in gap-free columns by selecting the optimal subset of sequences to exclude from the alignment.

bioschemas.name: MaxAlign
